level.heading: Exception for motor vehicles.
level.text: If the only property of a decedent is not more than 2 motor vehicles, the Mayor may transfer title to the motor vehicles in accordance with section 50-1501.02(d) . If title is transferred under this section, administration of the estate of the decedent is not necessary.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 3-72
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-72, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 20-301.
